name: 12.9-inch iPad Pro Wi‑Fi + Cellular 1TB - Space Gray
shortDescription: 12.9-inch iPad Pro Wi‑Fi + Cellular 1TB - Space Gray
longDescription: iPad Pro redefines what iPad is capable of. It features the Liquid Retina display —the world’s most advanced mobile display. Powered by the A12Z Bionic chip, iPad Pro is faster and more powerful than most PC laptops. It also adds an Ultra Wide camera and studio-quality mics, enabling new pro workflows. And the breakthrough LiDAR Scanner makes iPad Pro the world’s best device for AR.

additionalInfo.display:
Liquid Retina display
12.9-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit Multi-Touch display with IPS technology
2732-by-2048-pixel resolution at 264 pixels per inch (ppi)
ProMotion technology
Wide color display (P3)
True Tone display
Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating
Fully laminated display
Antireflective coating
600 nits brightness
additionalInfo.processor:
A12Z Bionic chip with 64-bit architecture
Neural Engine
Embedded M12 coprocessor
additionalInfo.wireless:
UMTS/HSPA/HSPA+/DC-HSDPA (850, 900, 1700/2100, 1900, 2100 MHz); GSM/EDGE (850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz)
Gigabit-class LTE (Models A2068 and A2069: bands 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 13, 14, 17, 18, 19, 20, 25, 26, 29, 30, 34, 38, 39, 40, 41, 42, 46, 48, 66, 71)
Data only
Wi-Fi calling
eSIM
802.11ax Wi-Fi 6; simultaneous dual band (2.4GHz and 5GHz); HT80 with MIMO
Bluetooth 5.0 technology
additionalInfo.camera:
Wide: 12MP, ƒ/1.8 aperture
Ultra Wide: 10MP, ƒ/2.4 aperture, and 125° field of view
2x optical zoom out; digital zoom up to 5x
Five-element lens (Wide and Ultra Wide)
Brighter True Tone flash
Panorama (up to 63MP)
Sapphire crystal lens cover
Backside illumination sensor
Hybrid IR filter
Autofocus with Focus Pixels (Wide)
Tap to focus with Focus Pixels (Wide)
Wide color capture for photos and Live Photos
Exposure control
Noise reduction
Smart HDR for photos
Auto image stabilization
Burst mode
Timer mode
Photo geotagging
Image formats captured: HEIF and JPEG
additionalInfo.videoRecording:
4K video recording at 24 fps, 30 fps, or 60 fps (Wide); 60 fps (Ultra Wide)
1080p HD video recording at 30 fps or 60 fps
720p HD video recording at 30 fps
Brighter True Tone flash
Slo-mo video support for 1080p at 120 fps or 240 fps (Wide); 240 fps (Ultra Wide)
Time-lapse video with stabilization
Cinematic video stabilization (1080p and 720p)
Continuous autofocus video
Noise reduction
Take 8MP still photos while recording 4K video
Playback zoom
Video geotagging
Video formats captured: HEVC and H.264
additionalInfo.trueDepthCamera:
7MP photos
Portrait mode
Portrait Lighting
Animoji and Memoji
1080p HD video recording at 30 fps or 60 fps
Retina Flash
ƒ/2.2 aperture
Wide color capture for photos and Live Photos
Smart HDR
Backside illumination sensor
Auto image stabilization
Burst mode
Exposure control
Timer mode
additionalInfo.faceID:
Enabled by TrueDepth camera for facial recognition
Unlock iPad
Secure personal data within apps
Make purchases from the iTunes Store, App Store, and Apple Books
additionalInfo.battery:
Built-in 28.65-watt-hour rechargeable lithium-polymer battery
Up to 10 hours of surfing the web on Wi-Fi or watching video
Charging via power adapter or USB-C to computer system
additionalInfo.dimensions:
Height: 11.04 inches (280.6 mm)
Width: 8.46 inches (214.9 mm)
Depth: 0.23 inch (5.9 mm)
Weight: 1.42 pounds (643 grams)
additionalInfo.whatsInTheBox:
iPad Pro
USB-C Charge Cable (1 meter)
18W USB-C Power Adapter
additionalInfo.operatingSystem:
iPadOS
iPadOS comes with powerful features and built-in apps designed to take advantage of the unique capabilities of iPad.
additionalInfo.accessibility:
Accessibility features help people with disabilities get the most out of their new iPad Pro. With built-in support for vision, hearing, mobility, and learning, you can create and do amazing things.
Features include:
  • Voice Control
  • VoiceOver
  • Zoom
  • Magnifier
  • Siri and Dictation
  • Switch Control
  • Closed Captions
  • AssistiveTouch
  • Speak Screen
additionalInfo.videoCalling:
FaceTime video
iPad to any FaceTime-enabled device over Wi-Fi or cellular
additionalInfo.audioCalling:
FaceTime audio
iPad to any FaceTime-enabled device over Wi-Fi or cellular
additionalInfo.applePay:
Pay with your iPad using Face ID within apps and on the web
Send and receive money in Messages
additionalInfo.siri:
Use your voice to send messages, set reminders, and more
Get proactive suggestions
Use hands-free
Listen and identify songs
additionalInfo.tvAndVideo:
AirPlay Mirroring, photos, audio, and video out to Apple TV (2nd generation or later)
Supports Dolby Vision and HDR10 content
Video mirroring and video out support: Up to 4K through USB-C Digital AV Multiport Adapter and USB-C VGA Multiport Adapter (adapters sold separately)
additionalInfo.warranty:
Limited warranty

Every iPad comes with complimentary telephone technical support for 90 days from your iPad purchase date and a one-year limited warranty.

servicePlans.name: AppleCare+ for iPad, iPad Air, or iPad mini

relatedProducts.name: Smart Keyboard Folio for iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th generation) - US English
relatedProducts.shortDescription: Smart Keyboard Folio for iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th generation) - US English
relatedProducts.longDescription: The Smart Keyboard Folio for the new 12.9-inch iPad Pro is a full-size keyboard when you need it, provides elegant front and back protection when you don’t, and allows for convenient viewing angles. And with no charging or pairing required, just attach the keyboard and start typing.

relatedProducts.name: Smart Folio for iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th generation) - English Lavender
relatedProducts.shortDescription: Smart Folio for iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th generation) - English Lavender
relatedProducts.longDescription: The Smart Folio for the new 12.9-inch iPad Pro model now offers protection for both the front and back. It also provides open-to-wake and close-to-sleep functionality.

relatedProducts.name: Magic Keyboard for iPad Pro 12.9‑inch (5th generation) - Russian - White
relatedProducts.shortDescription: Magic Keyboard for iPad Pro 12.9‑inch (5th generation) - Russian - White
relatedProducts.longDescription: The Magic Keyboard is an amazing companion for iPad Pro 12.9-inch. It features an incredible typing experience, a trackpad that opens up new ways to work with iPadOS, a USB‑C port for passthrough charging, and front and back protection. The Magic Keyboard has a floating cantilever design, allowing you to attach iPad Pro magnetically and to smoothly adjust it to the perfect viewing angle for you.

additionalInfo.highlights: ["Comfortable backlit keys and a scissor mechanism with 1 mm travel for quiet, responsive typing.","Designed for Multi‑Touch gestures and the cursor in iPadOS.","Smooth angle adjustability delivers the perfect viewing angle.","USB-C port for charging iPad Pro, freeing up the port on the iPad for other accessories.","Folds into a case to provide front and back protection for traveling with iPad Pro."]
additionalInfo.manufacturerNote:
[1. Magic Keyboard subject to availability.
2. Magic Keyboard is sold separately. Compatible with iPad Pro 11-inch (1st generation or later), iPad Pro 12.9-inch (3rd generation or later), and iPad Air (4th generation)."]

additionalInfo.highlights: ["Comfortable backlit keys and a scissor mechanism with 1 mm travel for quiet, responsive typing.","Designed for Multi‑Touch gestures and the cursor in iPadOS.","Smooth angle adjustability delivers the perfect viewing angle.","USB-C port for charging iPad Pro, freeing up the port on the iPad for other accessories.","Folds into a case to provide front and back protection for traveling with iPad Pro."]
additionalInfo.manufacturerNote:
[1. Magic Keyboard subject to availability.
2. Magic Keyboard is sold separately. Compatible with iPad Pro 11-inch (1st generation or later), iPad Pro 12.9-inch (3rd generation or later), and iPad Air (4th generation)."]

relatedProducts.name: Apple Pencil (2nd generation)
relatedProducts.longDescription:
The new Apple Pencil delivers pixel-perfect precision and industry-leading low latency, making it great for drawing, sketching, coloring, taking notes, marking up email, and more. And it’s as easy and natural to use as a pencil.
The new Apple Pencil also features an intuitive touch surface that supports double-tapping. So now you can change tools without setting it down.
Made specifically for the 11-inch iPad Pro and 12.9-inch iPad Pro (3rd generation), it features a flat edge that attaches magnetically for automatic charging and pairing.

additionalInfo.dimensions:
Length: 6.53 inches (166 mm)
Diameter: 0.35 inch (8.9 mm)
Weight: 0.73 ounce (20.7 grams)

relatedProducts.name: Native Union Stow Slim Sleeve for 12.9-inch iPad Pro
relatedProducts.shortDescription: Native Union Stow Slim Sleeve for 12.9-inch iPad Pro
relatedProducts.longDescription: Native Union Stow Slim Sleeve for iPad combines refined protection with practical functionality.  Designed to accommodate your Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard or Smart Keyboard Folio, the sleeve is crafted with the same techniques used for high-quality leather goods. Its quilted interior and coated canvas finish shield your iPad from the elements, while the magnetic closure and exterior pocket ensure more seamless access to your everyday essentials.

additionalInfo.highlights: ["Easy-access and secure magnetic closure","Slim design that allows room for Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard Folio","Resistant textile exterior","Soft quilted interior","Coated canvas finish"]
additionalInfo.whatsInTheBox: ["Native Union Stow Slim Sleeve for iPad"]

relatedProducts.shortDescription: Logitech Combo Touch Keyboard Case with Trackpad for iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th generation)

additionalInfo.highlights: ["Detachable keyboard and adjustable kick-back stand for typing, viewing, reading, and sketching","Protective, formfitting case that protects the front, back, and corners of your iPad Pro and securely holds it in place no matter what you’re doing","Integrated high-precision, click-anywhere trackpad that allows you to use the full surface to work and perform Multi-Touch gestures","Auto-adjusting backlit keys with 16 levels of brightness for comfortable typing day or night","Laptop-like keyboard with full row of iPadOS shortcut keys for one-tap access to volume controls, media controls, and more","Smart Connector technology for instant power and pairing. Power is sourced directly from iPad so you never have to charge the keyboard","Space to charge Apple Pencil (2nd generation) while keeping the case on"]
